Lubbock.KBZO (AM):
KBZO (1460 AM) is a radio station broadcasting a Spanish adult hits music format. Licensed to Lubbock, Texas, United States, the station serves the Lubbock area. The station is owned by Entravision Holdings, LLC.


== History ==
A station at 1460 was activated by a couple of ex-KSEL sales reps in 1953.
